name: jonathan's bowl cozy
notes:
**create for yourself or a friend a very useful and practical bowl cozy. note: if you plan on placing this in the actual microwave you will need a 100% cotton yarn or 100% natural fiber yarn. do not use a yarn with synthetic fibers if you plan on microwaving.** 

**size:** small (medium, large)-(diameter across top): 5.75 (6.25, 6.75)‚Äù/14.5 (16, 17)cm; **this will work best on bowls that have straight sides with no ledge/lip at the top and ones that do not have a very wide bottom**

**stitches & techniques used:** chains, slip stitch, single crochet, half double crochet, double crochet, extended double crochet, working in the third loop, working in the back loop only

**yarn:** #4 worsted weight, 75 (90, 105) yards of lion brand 24/7 cotton or suitable substitute of 100% cotton

**tools:** us size (g/6) 4.0 mm crochet hook, yarn needle, scissors

**other:** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns.
